group_1.narration: The plan was a huge success!@With the help of the Kamihama Magical Girls,@we defeated every last ex-Nagisa!
That said... everyone really is strong.@They put up a wonderful fight!@I'm sure that even the Law of Cycles@saw their mighty efforts.
Through this little one's "eyes," that is...

group_1.textLeft: Thanks to yours truly...
We managed to deal with the sudden abnormal@Witch outbreak.
I think that deserves a medal, don't you?
But...
I've been thinking, this whole time.
Why did the Law of Cycles send me to Kamihama...?
What does the Law of Cycles want...?
If it just wanted to investigate Kamihama, there's@plenty of Magical Girls more suitable than Nagisa.
So despite that, why me...?
A universe separate from the Law of Cycles.@An undecided future, unknown even to God...
When I first awoke in the Law of Cycles,@the voice I heard...
It sounded just like a human.
And when I exhausted the last of my strength@as a Magical Girl...
That "someone" who welcomed me to the Law of@Cycles sounded the same.
...She looked just like a Magical Girl, herself.
The fact that I'm even talking to you right now...
Is because I think the Law of Cycles@has a personality of its own.
Did that girl look the way she did@in order to comfort me?
Or was it because the Law of Cycles WANTED@to look that way?
...Hm-hm. Well, for now...
I think the first thing to do should be@to secure my freedom!

group_1.narration: But Nagisa's journey alongside@the Surveillance Camera of Cycles ends here!

group_1.textCenter: The reason you sent Nagisa to Kamihama...
It wasn't to unite this universe with the Law of@Cycles. Quite the opposite, I'm sure!

group_1.narration: For humans to live their lives@in a more human way,@the future must stay unknown.
The Law of Cycles wanted the future@to be a blank canvasâ€”@clean and undecided!
Even if that future@some day breaks the universe@into a billion pieces...@If you ask me,@I wouldn't care one bit!
I could turn against the Law of Cycles!@Betray even God!@That must be why@it unconsciously chose me!
Melt, o cheese! Tremble, o universe!@Nagisa Momoe was sent to this land of Kamihama@as an unprecedented trickster,@to protect the humanity that@dwells within the Law of Cycles!
My goal: preventing this universe@from combining with the@Law of Cycles's universe...

group_1.textCenter: And with all that decided, it's time for some@Kamihama sightseeing!
